Title: Sudden, Unexpected Crocolisk Aggression
Description:
Normally, my day consists of catching fish, and then eating the fish I caught, followed by sleeping. Note that I did not include "fight with a crocolisk" in that list of activities.

You look like a handy $c. Can you go get rid of some of these crocolisks, so I can get back to my regular routine? The crocolisks normally keep to themselves up at Kea Krak, to the northwest.
ObjectivesText: Slay 8 Mortbreath crocolisks at Kea Krak.
CompletionText: What would make the crocs attack like this?
RewardText:
Yesterday, we were fishing happily. Today, the crocs just started... tryin' to eat us.

Strange.
